channel.title: Cachedownloader
channel.description:
i downloaded the source torvapkz and it came with a client, but it doesnt automatically download the cache it just has it in zip form in the client folder, i dont have to much experience in client so could some1 help me out on what to do exactly to make it so that u dont need to extract the cache to the c:/ drive this is starting to become a problem
thanks :p

item.title: Cachedownloader
item.dc:creator: @lord_inie lord inie
item.description:
@lord_inie wrote:

Just make a batch file:

unrar x -p- “file name.rar”

Read full topic
